text: last night hundreds of protesters tried
to gather in the center of Istanbul it's
here near Taksim Square and a well-known
place for anti-government protests but
are forbidden by security forces and the
police broke them up using large amounts
of gas rubber bullets turning the center
of his sample into again and all too
common war zone lots of gas also in
other parts of the city there were
similar protests where I live I went to
sleep the smell of gas very heavily in
the air in the capital Ankara as well
and in some other cities as well and
also in the mining city of sama where
this catastrophe has happened from the
prime minister visited yesterday there
were protests there too so there is a
great deal of anger although it has to
be said it isn't on a massive scale but
like what happened last summer but there
is there does appear to be growing anger
and further protests our call for today
